name: LinuxDistros
0:
”Alexa, ask Linux Distros to give me a distro”
”Alexa, ask Linux Distros for a distro”
”Alexa, ask Linux Distros to tell me a linux distro”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: linux distros
des: Tired of using Ubuntu or Arch? Ask Alexa for a wacky new distribution to play with. The current list has over 40 uncommon distributions you've probably never heard of before.
